issue.title: Error when starting BLACS from console

content.raw: Thanks for looking into it. Didn't think it was much of a problem until now nor did I know I was starting all my labscript apps 'wrong'. Btw what does work is doing  ```python __main__.py``` and ```python FULLPATH/blacs/__main__.py``` where as ```python blacs/__main__.py``` doesn't work. Why exactly shouldn't I run things directly from the directory?
content.html: Thanks for looking into it. Didn't think it was much of a problem until now nor did I know I was starting all my labscript apps 'wrong'. Btw what does work is doing python __main__.py and python FULLPATH/blacs/__main__.py where as python blacs/__main__.py doesn't work. Why exactly shouldn't I run things directly from the directory?
